text: Banco Macro is an Argentine private capital bank. is the second largest domestically-owned private bank in Argentina. ==Offices== The Macro is one of the most important private banks in Argentina. It is made up of two merged institutions, which are Banco Macro and Banco Tucum√°n, which in total constitutes a structure of 506 service points. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1976 establishments in South America Category:1970s establishments in Argentina Category:Companies based in Buenos Aires Category:Banks of Argentina
